citation: Bouckaert RR, Lemey P, Dunn M, Greenhill SJ, Alekseyenko AV, Drummond AJ, Gray RD, Suchard MA & Atkinson QD. 2012. Mapping the Origins and Expansion of the Indo-European Language Family. Science, 337(6097), 957-960.
name: Mapping the Origins and Expansion of the Indo-European Language Family
